channel.title: Waxing Deep Radio
channel.itunes:subtitle: Waxing Deep Radio: Good Music for Good People
channel.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
channel.itunes:summary: Waxing Deep is a weekly radio programme that spans jazz, funk, psych, disco, Brazilian, afro, Latin, soul, and happy combinations thereof. Expect eclectic, intelligent, and unpretentious programming that shares brilliant obscurities which deserve exposure. Jazz cats, jaded collectors, good music neophytes, and the simply curious will all dig the Waxing Deep sound (guaranteed).
channel.description: Waxing Deep is a weekly radio programme that spans jazz, funk, psych, disco, Brazilian, afro, Latin, soul, and happy combinations thereof. Expect eclectic, intelligent, and unpretentious programming that shares brilliant obscurities which deserve exposure. Jazz cats, jaded collectors, good music neophytes, and the simply curious will all dig the Waxing Deep sound (guaranteed).
channel.itunes:keywords: funk, bollywood, disco, soul, jazz, bossa nova, samba, latin, rare groove, fusion, modal jazz

item.title: Waxing Deep--November 8, 2008
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Waxing Deep Radio: Sheepish about our absence, excited about our return
item.itunes:summary: It's been over half a year since our last show! That is nothing short of a tragedy. We intend to compensate for our negligence with tonnes and tonnes of good music.
item.itunes:keywords: funk, bollywood, disco, soul, jazz, bossa nova, samba, latin, rare groove, fusion, modal jazz
item.description: It's been over half a year since our last show! That is nothing short of a tragedy. We intend to compensate for our negligence with tonnes and tonnes of good music.
item.author: info@waxingdeep.org (Dan Zacks)

item.title: Waxing Deep--April 25, 2008
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Waxing Deep Radio: Eight Years of Classics
item.itunes:summary: After eight years, Waxing Deep's presence on campus-community radio comes to a close. The show will continue largely unchanged as a podcast, but we thought we should use this last CHSR show to celebrate all the classic Waxing Deep cuts that defined us over the years.
item.itunes:keywords: funk, bollywood, disco, soul, jazz, bossa nova, samba, latin, rare groove, fusion, modal jazz
item.description: After eight years, Waxing Deep's presence on campus-community radio comes to a close. The show will continue largely unchanged as a podcast, but we thought we should use this last CHSR show to celebrate all the classic Waxing Deep cuts that defined us over the years.
item.author: info@waxingdeep.org (Dan Zacks)

item.title: Waxing Deep--February 22, 2008
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Waxing Deep Radio: Playing Records for Phirpo
item.itunes:summary: This week we make up for two pre-emptions by playing as much music as we can fit into two hours and still meet our CRTC obligations
item.itunes:keywords: funk, bollywood, disco, soul, jazz, bossa nova, samba, latin, rare groove, fusion, modal jazz

item.title: Waxing Deep--February 1, 2008
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Waxing Deep Radio: Asi! Asi!
item.itunes:summary: This week we explore some pre-revolutionary Cuban sounds, introduce a very rare and extremely choice Cuban version of "Vehicle"--destined for vol. 2 of "Si, Para Usted"--and enjoy Latin selections from Joe Tallarico.
item.itunes:keywords: funk, bollywood, disco, soul, jazz, bossa nova, samba, latin, rare groove, fusion, modal jazz
item.description: This week we explore some pre-revolutionary Cuban sounds, introduce a very rare and extremely choice Cuban version of "Vehicle"--destined for vol. 2 of "Si, Para Usted"--and enjoy Latin selections from Joe Tallarico.
item.author: info@waxingdeep.org (Dan Zacks)

item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Waxing Deep Radio: From Fredericton to France
item.itunes:summary: Tom Wieland shares some selections and a little Tribe jazz.

item.title: Waxing Deep--November 31, 2007
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Waxing Deep Radio: Waiting For the Studio to Burn Down
item.itunes:summary: Adrian Leach generously provides another Happy Jazz session that we follow with a thirty minute cosmic excursion from the Unobstructed Universe.
item.itunes:keywords: funk, bollywood, disco, soul, jazz, bossa nova, samba, latin, rare groove, fusion, modal jazz

item.title: Waxing Deep--November 16, 2007
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Waxing Deep Radio: Nexus for the Raer
item.itunes:summary: Reynaldo shares an hour of bugalu and we showcase the infamous Matthew Larkin Cassell LP. The regular mix-up follows. Not to be missed.
item.itunes:keywords: funk, bollywood, disco, soul, jazz, bossa nova, samba, latin, rare groove, fusion, modal jazz
item.description: Reynaldo shares an hour of bugalu and we showcase the infamous Matthew Larkin Cassell LP. The regular mix-up follows. Not to be missed.
item.author: info@waxingdeep.org (Dan Zacks)

item.title: Waxing Deep--November 2, 2007
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Waxing Deep Radio: Gremlin's Keep Us From Podcasting
item.itunes:summary: Nothing more than as much good music as we can fit into two hours (including three tracks from the Dancer's Inferno LP
item.itunes:keywords: funk, bollywood, disco, soul, jazz, bossa nova, samba, latin, rare groove, fusion, modal jazz
item.description: Nothing more than as much good music as we can fit into two hours (including three tracks from the Dancer's Inferno LP
item.author: info@waxingdeep.org (Dan Zacks)

item.title: Waxing Deep--October 12, 2007
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Waxing Deep Radio: Flat Foot Hustlin'
item.itunes:summary: Japan’s Black Vinyl Junky shares a selection of his favourite “rare-grooves”—16 extremely rare, storied, and obscure tracks. It’s a master class in Japanese funk collecting and a treat for people interested in finally hearing the likes of Mike Taylor, Marvin Whoremonger, and the Sidewinders. We follow Black Vinyl Junky with some jazz, disco, bossa, and mpb, which is to say the regular Waxing Deep mix-up.
item.itunes:keywords: funk, bollywood, disco, soul, jazz, bossa nova, samba, latin, rare groove, fusion, modal jazz
item.description: Japan’s Black Vinyl Junky shares a selection of his favourite “rare-grooves”—16 extremely rare, storied, and obscure tracks. It’s a master class in Japanese funk collecting and a treat for people interested in finally hearing the likes of Mike Taylor, Marvin Whoremonger, and the Sidewinders. We follow Black Vinyl Junky with some jazz, disco, bossa, and mpb, which is to say the regular Waxing Deep mix-up.
item.author: info@waxingdeep.org (Dan Zacks)

item.title: Waxing Deep--September 28, 2007
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Waxing Deep Radio: Looking Beyond Bad Band Names and Jacket Art
item.itunes:summary: This week it's further explorations of recorded Canadiana, a jaw-dropping new Cuban funk discovery, some classics, and the regular Waxing Deep mix-up.
item.itunes:keywords: funk, bollywood, disco, soul, jazz, bossa nova, samba, latin, rare groove, fusion, modal jazz
item.description: This week it's further explorations of recorded Canadiana, a jaw-dropping new Cuban funk discovery, some classics, and the regular Waxing Deep mix-up.
item.author: info@waxingdeep.org (Dan Zacks)

item.title: Waxing Deep--September 21, 2007
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Waxing Deep Radio: Easy Evil
item.itunes:summary: Paul Goncalves of Superfly Records shares “Nasara”, a mix of African, Central American, and Caribbean music. Check the track listing for more details. We follow with some quirky singles from Canada and abroad, including an infectious white label version of “Down by the River” by The Bells.>
item.itunes:keywords: funk, bollywood, disco, soul, jazz, bossa nova, samba, latin, rare groove, fusion, modal jazz
item.description: Paul Goncalves of Superfly Records shares “Nasara”, a mix of African, Central American, and Caribbean music. Check the track listing for more details. We follow with some quirky singles from Canada and abroad, including an infectious white label version of “Down by the River” by The Bells.
item.author: info@waxingdeep.org (Dan Zacks)

item.title: Waxing Deep--September 7, 2007
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Waxing Deep Radio: Compiling and Compiling and Then Compiling Some More
item.itunes:summary: A four month hiatus means an embarrassing backlog of music to share! We start with selections from our favourite recent compilations, including offerings from the Numero Group, VampiSoul, and Votary. A tribute to the late Doug Riley follows and then jazz, some obligatory Cuban cuts, and the regular Waxing Deep mix-up. Enjoy!
item.itunes:keywords: funk, bollywood, disco, soul, jazz, bossa nova, samba, latin, rare groove, fusion, modal jazz
item.description: A four month hiatus means an embarrassing backlog of music to share! We start with selections from our favourite recent compilations, including offerings from the Numero Group, VampiSoul, and Votary. A tribute to the late Doug Riley follows and then jazz, some obligatory Cuban cuts, and the regular Waxing Deep mix-up. Enjoy!
item.author: info@waxingdeep.org (Dan Zacks)

item.title: Waxing Deep--May 4, 2007
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Waxing Deep Radio: Classic Tracks for Waxing Nostalgiac (and Deep)
item.itunes:summary: It's classic Waxing Deep: two tracks of previously unreleased Webster Lewis (courtesy of the good people at Plastic Strip), fun with obscure Canadian singles, some excellent Israeli jazz by The Platina, and much more.
item.itunes:keywords: funk, bollywood, disco, soul, jazz, bossa nova, samba, latin, rare groove, fusion, modal jazz
item.description: It's classic Waxing Deep: two tracks of previously unreleased Webster Lewis (courtesy of the good people at Plastic Strip), fun with obscure Canadian singles, some excellent Israeli jazz by The Platina, and much more.
item.author: info@waxingdeep.org (Dan Zacks)

item.title: Waxing Deep--April 13, 2007
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Waxing Deep Radio: Heavy Latin in Dim Studios
item.itunes:summary: The infamous Reynaldo offers a glimpe into his Latin collection with an exclusive mix for Waxing Deep. With the remaining time we share a noteworthy cut from Ronnie April, a funky track from the storied Klute OST, and some bugalu.
item.itunes:keywords: funk, bollywood, disco, soul, jazz, bossa nova, samba, latin, rare groove, fusion, modal jazz
item.description: The infamous Reynaldo offers a glimpe into his Latin collection with an exclusive mix for Waxing Deep. With the remaining time we share a noteworthy cut from Ronnie April, a funky track from the storied Klute OST, and some bugalu.
item.author: info@waxingdeep.org (Dan Zacks)

item.title: Waxing Deep--April 6, 2007
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Waxing Deep Radio: Bongos for the Heads
item.itunes:summary: DJ Bongohead aka Pablo Yglesias shares his "Las 4 Culturas" mix: selections of Latin funk, soul, bugalu, and psych. Heavy!
item.itunes:keywords: funk, bollywood, disco, soul, jazz, bossa nova, samba, latin, rare groove, fusion, modal jazz
item.description: DJ Bongohead aka Pablo Yglesias shares his "Las 4 Culturas" mix: selections of Latin funk, soul, bugalu, and psych. Heavy!
item.author: info@waxingdeep.org (Dan Zacks)

item.title: Waxing Deep--March 16, 2007
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Waxing Deep Radio: Studies in Eclecticism
item.itunes:summary: It's another two hours of classic Waxing Deep! Superb, sometimes overlooked music from the world over with a mini-feature on the productions of Ben McPeek.
item.itunes:keywords: funk, bollywood, disco, soul, jazz, bossa nova, samba, latin, rare groove, fusion, modal jazz
item.description: It's another two hours of classic Waxing Deep! Superb, sometimes overlooked music from the world over with a mini-feature on the productions of Ben McPeek.
item.author: info@waxingdeep.org (Dan Zacks)

item.title: Waxing Deep--March 9, 2007
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Waxing Deep Radio: Happy Records of Happy Jazz
item.itunes:summary: Adrian Leach provides another Happy Jazz session, which we follow with a quirky mix-up of bossa, psych, funk, and jazz.
item.itunes:keywords: funk, bollywood, disco, soul, jazz, bossa nova, samba, latin, rare groove, fusion, modal jazz
item.description: Adrian Leach provides another Happy Jazz session, which we follow with a quirky mix-up of bossa, psych, funk, and jazz.
item.author: info@waxingdeep.org (Dan Zacks)

item.title: Waxing Deep--March 2, 2007
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Waxing Deep Radio: Dusty Records for People with Hand Sanitizer
item.itunes:summary: This week we bring a superb exclusive mix from DJ Yosaku filled with monster jazz and funk selections. We also commit to more timely updates to the podcast!
item.itunes:keywords: funk, bollywood, disco, soul, jazz, bossa nova, samba, latin, rare groove, fusion, modal jazz
item.description: This week we bring a superb exclusive mix from DJ Yosaku filled with monster jazz and funk selections. We also commit to more timely updates to the podcast!
item.author: info@waxingdeep.org (Dan Zacks)

item.title: Waxing Deep--February 16, 2007
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Waxing Deep Radio: Good Music for Good People
item.itunes:summary: This week we meander through obscure Canadian prog, Italian jazz waltzes, Romanian scat vocals, island funk, a little Sussex fun, some disco, and a great deal more.
item.itunes:keywords: funk, bollywood, disco, soul, jazz, bossa nova, samba, latin, rare groove, fusion, modal jazz
item.description: This week we meander through obscure Canadian prog, Italian jazz waltzes, Romanian scat vocals, island funk, a little Sussex fun, some disco, and a great deal more.
item.author: info@waxingdeep.org (Dan Zacks)

item.title: Waxing Deep--February 2, 2007
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Waxing Deep Radio: Good Music for Superfly People Who Like Their Brazilian Tracks Deep
item.itunes:summary: Paulo of superflyrecords.com brings a mix of funky obscurities during hour one. We follow as best we can with a selection Brazilian records that have been on the top of our ‘to play’ stack for much too long.
item.itunes:keywords: funk, bollywood, disco, soul, jazz, bossa nova, samba, latin, rare groove, fusion, modal jazz
item.description: Paulo of superflyrecords.com brings a mix of funky obscurities during hour one. We follow as best we can with a selection Brazilian records that have been on the top of our ‘to play’ stack for much too long.
item.author: info@waxingdeep.org (Dan Zacks)

item.title: Waxing Deep--January 26, 2007
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Waxing Deep Radio: Good Music for People who like their Cuban Music Funky
item.itunes:summary: We celebrate the release of "Si, Para Usted", our compilation of Cuban Funk on Waxing Deep Records, with some heavy tracks from the album. Pysch, garage, jazz, and Brazilian music follow in classic Waxing Deep fashion.
item.itunes:keywords: funk, bollywood, disco, soul, jazz, bossa nova, samba, latin, rare groove, fusion, modal jazz
item.description: We celebrate the release of "Si, Para Usted", our compilation of Cuban Funk on Waxing Deep Records, with some heavy tracks from the album. Pysch, garage, jazz, and Brazilian music follow in classic Waxing Deep fashion.
item.author: info@waxingdeep.org (Dan Zacks)

item.title: Waxing Deep--January 12, 2007
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Waxing Deep Radio: Good Music for People Like a Bit of This and a Bit of That
item.itunes:summary: Waxing Deep eases into 2007 with a mix from the talented DJ Catalist and our first ever and much anticipated playlist!
item.itunes:keywords: funk, bollywood, disco, soul, jazz, bossa nova, samba, latin, rare groove, fusion, modal jazz
item.description: Waxing Deep eases into 2007 with a mix from the talented DJ Catalist and our first ever, much anticipated playlist!
item.author: daniel.zacks@mail.mcgill.ca (Dan Zacks)

item.title: Waxing Deep--December 1, 2006
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Waxing Deep Radio: Good Music for People Who Like Disco Edited
item.itunes:summary: Last week we had so much fun keeping the entire show to ourselves that we decided to postpone General Eclectic's guest mix and do it again! And so we happily, if somewhat selfishly, present two eclectic hours of classic Waxing Deep.
item.itunes:keywords: funk, bollywood, disco, soul, jazz, bossa nova, samba, latin, rare groove, fusion, modal jazz
item.description: Last week we had so much fun keeping the entire show to ourselves that we decided to postpone General Eclectic's guest mix and do it again! And so we happily, if somewhat selfishly, present two eclectic hours of classic Waxing Deep.
item.author: daniel.zacks@mail.mcgill.ca (Dan Zacks)

item.title: Waxing Deep--November 24, 2006
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Waxing Deep Radio: Good Music for Good People
item.itunes:summary: As the pile of records we have yet to air towered above us, it seemed like a good time for a classic Waxing Deep. We shelved the guest mix for another week and settled down in the studio for two hours of good music. The selection is as eclectic as you’ve come to expect; we slide between jazz, funk, Brazilian, and fusion and had a blast doing it.
item.itunes:keywords: funk, bollywood, disco, soul, jazz, bossa nova, samba, latin, rare groove, fusion, modal jazz
item.description: As the pile of records we have yet to air towered above us, it seemed like a good time for a classic Waxing Deep. We shelved the guest mix for another week and settled down in the studio for two hours of good music. The selection is as eclectic as you’ve come to expect; we slide between jazz, funk, Brazilian, and fusion and had a blast doing it.
item.author: daniel.zacks@mail.mcgill.ca (Dan Zacks)

item.title: Waxing Deep--November 17, 2006
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Waxing Deep Radio: Good Music for People Who Appreciate the Value of E-Digging
item.itunes:summary: San Francisco’s DJ Ferrari, a Silicone Valley executive by day and über-collector by night, provides an outstanding Afro-Brazilian mix for the first hour and a half of the show. Even jaded Brazilian collectors will appreciate the intelligence and deftness of Ferrari’s mixing. Hour two--what there is of it--features eastern jazz, some funk, the obligatory Cuban track, and another brilliant cut from Augusto Martelli’s “Black Sounds From White People”.
item.itunes:keywords: funk, bollywood, disco, soul, jazz, bossa nova, samba, latin, rare groove, fusion, modal jazz
item.description: San Francisco’s DJ Ferrari, a Silicone Valley executive by day and über-collector by night, provides an outstanding Afro-Brazilian mix for the first hour and a half of the show. Even jaded Brazilian collectors will appreciate the intelligence and deftness of Ferrari’s mixing. Hour two--what there is of it--features eastern jazz, some funk, the obligatory Cuban track, and another brilliant cut from Augusto Martelli’s “Black Sounds From White People”.
item.author: daniel.zacks@mail.mcgill.ca (Dan Zacks)

item.title: Waxing Deep--November 10, 2006
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Waxing Deep Radio: Good Music for People Who Get Happy From Jazz
item.itunes:summary: Adrian Leach brings the first Happy Jazz session of the season and, as you would expect, it’s superb. Augusto Martelli, Rimona Francis, the Free Design, and a little pachanga keep things moving during hour two.
item.itunes:keywords: funk, bollywood, disco, soul, jazz, bossa nova, samba, latin, rare groove, fusion, modal jazz
item.description: Adrian Leach brings the first Happy Jazz session of the season and, as you would expect, it’s superb. Augusto Martelli, Rimona Francis, the Free Design, and a little pachanga keep things moving during hour two.
item.author: daniel.zacks@mail.mcgill.ca (Dan Zacks)

item.title: Waxing Deep--November 3, 2006
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Waxing Deep Radio: Good Music for People Who Like to Make Foot Prints on the Dancefloor
item.itunes:summary: This week it’s our great pleasure to share the a recent set from Toronto’s Foot Prints Collective—Jason Palma, General Eclectic, and DJ Stu. Foot Prints is one of the world’s few club nights where a crowd enthusiastically dances to the sort of music we play on Waxing Deep. With this set, the Collective digs deep to provide a taste of the scene they’ve lovingly built in Toronto. Unfortunately, a misbehaving CD recorder cuts the show’s second hour and introduces some frustrating distortion. Bare with us; we’ll have the bug fixed for the next show.
item.itunes:keywords: funk, bollywood, disco, soul, jazz, bossa nova, samba, latin, rare groove, fusion, modal jazz
item.description: This week it’s our great pleasure to share the a recent set from Toronto’s Foot Prints Collective—Jason Palma, General Eclectic, and DJ Stu. Foot Prints is one of the world’s few club nights where a crowd enthusiastically dances to the sort of music we play on Waxing Deep. With this set, the Collective digs deep to provide a taste of the scene they’ve lovingly built in Toronto. Unfortunately, a misbehaving CD recorder cuts the show’s second hour and introduces some frustrating distortion. Bare with us; we’ll have the bug fixed for the next show.
item.author: daniel.zacks@mail.mcgill.ca (Dan Zacks)

item.title: Waxing Deep--October 24, 2006
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Waxing Deep Radio: Good Music for People Who Appreciate the Marimba
item.itunes:summary: Edition Two of the Soulpusher African sessions! We received a hugely enthusiastic response to the first part and the tracks Soulpusher has selected for this week are just as good.
item.itunes:keywords: funk, bollywood, disco, soul, jazz, bossa nova, samba, latin, rare groove, fusion, modal jazz
item.description: Edition Two of the Soulpusher African sessions! We received a hugely enthusiastic response to the first part and the tracks Soulpusher has selected for this week are just as good.
item.author: daniel.zacks@mail.mcgill.ca (Dan Zacks)

item.title: Waxing Deep--October 13, 2006
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Waxing Deep Radio: Good Music for People Who Protect Their Records with Machine Guns
item.itunes:summary: DJ Soulpusher is currently living in Freetown, Sierra Leone, a city he uses as the starting point for regular West African digging trips. On this edition of Waxing Deep, Soulpusher shares some of his favourite recent finds in the first of a two part series. The regular Waxing Deep mix-up follows, including a standout rendition of the “The Best Has Yet To Come”.
item.itunes:keywords: funk, bollywood, disco, soul, jazz, bossa nova, samba, latin, rare groove, fusion, modal jazz
item.description: DJ Soulpusher is currently living in Freetown, Sierra Leone, a city he uses as the starting point for regular West African digging trips. On this edition of Waxing Deep, Soulpusher shares some of his favourite recent finds in the first of a two part series. The regular Waxing Deep mix-up follows, including a standout rendition of the “The Best Has Yet To Come”.
item.author: daniel.zacks@mail.mcgill.ca (Dan Zacks)

item.title: Waxing Deep--October 6, 2006
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Waxing Deep Radio: Good Music for People Who Like their Funk Made Between Cancer and Capricorn
item.itunes:keywords: funk, bollywood, disco, soul, jazz, bossa nova, samba, latin, rare groove, fusion, modal jazz
item.description: The mysterious Senior Vishal generously shares his Trouble for Travel mix of tropical funk. Vishal is a frequent guest at Toronto’s infamous Turning Point party and recently travelled throughout Africa and South America on a digging mission. His selections are heavy. We follow with lots of great jazz. This is a great edition!
item.author: daniel.zacks@mail.mcgill.ca (Dan Zacks)

item.title: Waxing Deep--September 29, 2006
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Waxing Deep Radio: Good Music for People Who Like ILL DRAMA HORN STABS BOSS SCAT HEAT
item.itunes:summary: This edition of Waxing Deep sees our regular mix-up happily interrupted by a brief mix from the infamous Beatdawg. Direct from his secretive Toronto studio, Beatdawg shares Japanese modern soul, library funk, and enough breaks and beats to make even the jaded producers salivate. A little digital distortion towards the show’s end courtesy of CHSR’s shoddy CD recorder is no match for the quality of this edition’s selections.
item.itunes:keywords: funk, bollywood, disco, soul, jazz, bossa nova, samba, latin, rare groove, fusion, modal jazz
item.description: This edition of Waxing Deep sees our regular mix-up happily interrupted by a brief mix from the infamous Beatdawg. Direct from his secretive Toronto studio, Beatdawg shares Japanese modern soul, library funk, and enough breaks and beats to make even the jaded producers salivate. A little digital distortion towards the show’s end courtesy of CHSR’s shoddy CD recorder is no match for the quality of this edition’s selections.
item.author: daniel.zacks@mail.mcgill.ca (Dan Zacks)

item.title: Waxing Deep--September 22, 2006
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Waxing Deep Radio: Good Music for People Looking for a Little Soul on a Fall Day
item.itunes:summary: Tom Noble of Lotusland Records joins Waxing Deep to discuss his label’s new releases. Tom also shares a heavy hour-long selection of sweet soul, modern soul, and funk—the perfect sound for a sunny fall afternoon. We follow Tom’s mix with the regular Waxing Deep mix-up, including a reissue from the new French label Sausage Records.
item.itunes:keywords: funk, bollywood, disco, soul, jazz, bossa nova, samba, latin, rare groove, fusion, modal jazz
item.description: Tom Noble of Lotusland Records joins Waxing Deep to discuss his label’s new releases. Tom also shares a heavy hour-long selection of sweet soul, modern soul, and funk—the perfect sound for a sunny fall afternoon. We follow Tom’s mix with the regular Waxing Deep mix-up, including a reissue from the new French label Sausage Records.
item.author: daniel.zacks@mail.mcgill.ca (Dan Zacks)

item.title: Waxing Deep--September 16, 2006
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Waxing Deep Radio: Good Music for People who Disappear for Four Months
item.itunes:summary: After a four month hiatus, we return with a proud anouncement: the first release on our new label, Waxing Deep Records. Learn about our soon to be released compilation of Cuban funk and listen to some killer Cuban records, obscure fusion, and lots of eclectic goodness presented Waxing Deep style
item.itunes:keywords: funk, bollywood, disco, soul, jazz, bossa nova, samba, latin, rare groove, fusion, modal jazz
item.description: Waxing Deep returns after a four month hiatus. We share tonnes of incredible new records and announce the first release on our new record label, Waxing Deep records.
item.author: daniel.zacks@mail.mcgill.ca (Dan Zacks)

item.title: Waxing Deep--April 27, 2006
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Waxing Deep Radio: Good Music for People Who Like To Get Freaky Jesus Freak Style
item.itunes:summary: We celebrate the last in-studio Waxing Deep for several months with another instalment of Adrian Leach's Happy Jazz sessions. Put simply, it's brilliant. The second hour is filled with Canadian obscurities and dancefloor sounds.
item.itunes:keywords: funk, bollywood, disco, soul, jazz, bossa nova, samba, latin, rare groove, fusion, modal jazz
item.description: We celebrate the last in-studio Waxing Deep for several months with another instalment of Adrian Leach's Happy Jazz sessions. Put simply, it's brilliant. The second hour is filled with Canadian obscurities and dancefloor sounds.
item.author: daniel.zacks@mail.mcgill.ca (Dan Zacks)

item.title: Waxing Deep--April 20, 2006
item.description: In celebration of April 20, Johnny Paycheck of Good Records, NYC brings us Waxing Deep's first ever dub mix. Expect heavy, 4/20 appropriate sounds from one of Manhattan's premiere collectors, DJs, and men-about-town.
item.author: daniel.zacks@mail.mcgill.ca (Dan Zacks)
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Waxing Deep Radio: Good Music for People Who Like Their Dub Bleary-Eyed
item.itunes:summary: Why did it take Waxing Deep so long to showcase dub? Whatever the reason, we can think of few people better than New York's Johnny Paycheck to properly bring the sound to Waxing Deep. He shares selections from his storied collection housed in numerous caches throughout Manhattan, NYC where Mr. Paycheck is the proprietor of Good Records NYC and a jet-set DJ. He's also a talented raconteur and obligingly shares tales from the record store trenches. We follow up Johnny's mix with the regular Waxing Deep mix-up.

item.title: Waxing Deep--April 6, 2006
item.description: Black Vinyl Junky aka Takayuki Fujikawa shares his "Mellow Groove"mix, which we follow up with tracks for the dancers.
item.author: daniel.zacks@mail.mcgill.ca (Dan Zacks)
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Waxing Deep Radio: Good Music for People who Like to Groove Mellow
item.itunes:summary: The über-collector Black Vinyl Junky shares some incredibly rare modern soul, fusion, jazz, soul, and funk from his infamous crates. We follow Takayuki's selections with tracks that had us turning up the monitor's to 11 and starting an impromptu jazz dance session. Heavy.

item.title: Waxing Deep--March 23, 2006
item.description: The regular mix-up: supre rare Australian jazz, some funk, some fusion heat
item.author: daniel.zacks@mail.mcgill.ca (Dan Zacks)
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Waxing Deep Radio: Good Music for People who Like the Warm Sound of Electric Keys
item.itunes:summary: This edition of Waxing Deep is without guest mix or interview. This means plenty of time for the regular mix-up, including some long tracks. Notable selections include the title track from the Jazzberry Patch LP and some very rare Australian jazz, but the whole show is good fun. Let us know what you think!

item.title: Waxing Deep--March 9, 2006
item.description: Tom Wieland's "Baile Funk" compilation: heavy Brazilian boogie, disco, funk, jazz, and more!
item.author: daniel.zacks@mail.mcgill.ca (Dan Zacks)
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Waxing Deep Radio: Good Music for People who like to boogie Brazilian style
item.itunes:summary: Tom Wieland of Les Gammas and Seven Samurais shares a 70+ minute mix of obscure Brazilian boogie, disco, funk, jazz, and fusion. With the remaining time we celebrate the re-acquisition of favourite Juan Carlos Caceres LP.

item.title: Waxing Deep--March 2, 2005
item.description: The Carnaval edition Waxing Deep plus Cuban heat in the second hour
item.author: daniel.zacks@mail.mcgill.ca (Dan Zacks)
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Waxing Deep Radio: Good Music for People Who Like to Celebrate Carnaval
item.itunes:summary: For the first hour Waxing Deep belatedly celebrates Carnaval with classic Brazilian party tunes, new and old. After a brief homage to the late Ray Barretto, hour two explores the funky part of the Areito catalogue and gets very deep indeed.

item.title: Waxing Deep--February 16, 2005
item.description: Classic Waxing Deep! We get to all the tracks we didn't have time to play in weeks past.
item.author: daniel.zacks@mail.mcgill.ca (Dan Zacks)
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Waxing Deep Radio: Good Music for People Who Like to Nod their Heads
item.itunes:summary: This episode begins with heavy head nodding beats from Grusin, Axelrod, and Gainsbourg, continues with funky Italian prog, delves into deep spiritual jazz (sublime!), explordes some Canadian lounge, scat, and even manages some bollywood and a little jesus freak psych. Great show!

item.title: Waxing Deep--February 9, 2005
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Jeff from Waxidermy.com discusses his site and shares some of his favourite tracks
item.itunes:summary: Jeff offer a fantastically leftfield mix in celebration of the launch of his site, waxidermy.com
item.itunes:keywords: funk jazz soul disco breaks hiphop soulstrut spiritual jazz vinyl DJ

item.title: Waxing Deep-February 2, 2006
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: This Frenchattack.com's Bobwall joins us with continental fire
item.itunes:summary: Bobwall brings an hour's worth of the tracks that he's currently most feeling and the result is an incredible mix. Definitely recommended. For hour two it's the regular mix-up.
item.itunes:keywords: funk jazz soul disco breaks hiphop soulstrut spiritual jazz vinyl DJ

item.title: Waxing Deep-January 26, 2006
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Featuring special guest Adrian Leach of Happy Jazz
item.itunes:summary: Adrian Leach returns to Waxing Deep with set of descargas and Latin funk for the dancers. We round out the show with deep Argentinian jazz, some Scandinavian material, a little Australian jazzfunk, and various bits of aural goodness.
item.itunes:keywords: funk jazz soul disco breaks hiphop soulstrut spiritual jazz vinyl DJ

item.title: Waxing Deep-January 19, 2006
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Featuring special guest Raj Mahal from Soulstrut.com
item.itunes:summary: Hour one is Soulstrut.com's Raj Mahal joining us to discuss the new Soulstrut LP Breakbeat Raer and to share his new and seriously heavy mix. For hour two we dig into the crates to showcase some Spanish fusion along with the usual selection of trop-drawer music.
item.itunes:keywords: funk jazz soul disco breaks hiphop soulstrut spiritual jazz vinyl DJ

item.title: Waxing Deep-January 12, 2006
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Classic "Too Many Good Records Edition" of Waxing Deep
item.itunes:summary: Finally a chance to play all the records we accumulated during our month off air! A show guaranteed to get you dancing (or your money back).
item.itunes:keywords: funk jazz soul disco breaks hiphop soulstrut spiritual jazz vinyl DJ

item.title: Waxing Deep--December 01, 2005
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: A Classic "Too Many Good Records" Edition of Waxing Deep
item.itunes:summary: This is a particularly eclectic Waxing Deep with everything from deep fusion to Italian modal jazz to rare Canadian psych and university big bands
item.itunes:keywords: funk jazz soul disco breaks hiphop soulstrut spiritual jazz vinyl DJ

item.title: Waxing Deep--November 10, 2005
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: A lovely, sunny Brazilian mix from Adrian Leach
item.itunes:summary: The first hour is a wonderful Brazilian mix from Adrian Leach of Happy Jazz; the second hour features further explorations into the CBC/RCI archives
item.itunes:keywords: funk jazz soul disco breaks hiphop soulstrut spiritual jazz vinyl DJ

item.title: Waxing Deep--October 20, 2005
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Featuring a very serious Latin mix from meatyogre
item.itunes:summary: This first hour offers a heavy Latin mix from Galapagos 4 recording artist meatyogre; the second act is more Latin with a little jazz for good measure
item.itunes:keywords: funk jazz soul disco breaks hiphop soulstrut spiritual jazz vinyl DJ

item.title: Waxing Deep--October 26, 2005
item.itunes:author: Dan Zacks
item.itunes:subtitle: Classic Waxing Deep
item.itunes:summary: Waxing Deep goes back to its roots! We start with a Fela cut and delve into deep jazz, rare and otherwise, and enjoy some nice Brazilian sides. No guest mixes.
item.itunes:keywords: funk jazz soul disco breaks hiphop soulstrut spiritual jazz vinyl DJ
